column4: heard of anyone losing internet connection a dual boot with xp after do a clean install of Ubuntu 8.10 on it partition
seems impossible. But for reference, my TV card doesn't want to work on XP but it does nicely in Ubuntu.
I did the same. I had 7.10, two days ago I installed 8.10, everything is nice except for my wireless card. I need to troubleshoot that instead of talking to you guys, hehe
in the device manager, remove the driver and reboot again into windows, maybe it is picked up again.
